verbs.description: [ARG1: asian market] [V: ordered] [ARG2: to clean up mess outside every week] fox31 looks at health inspections at restaurants in metro denver and along the front range little saigon super market the denver market failed with nine critical violations on august 30 2018 the issues included an excessive amount of trash and old equipment floor needs repair adams jefferson county vp of operations thornton erika gonzález jefferson county colorado douglas brooklyn weld county colorado denver thornton colorado erika gonzalez arapahoe tri county health department tri - county health department weld county broomfield colorado broomfield
